name: Pandada AI
tagline: Build data wealth: Turns files into McKinsey-level insights
description: Pandada empowers both non-technical operators and data scientists to achieve data wealth. Move beyond "chatting" with data‚ÄîPandada turn messy csvs, pdfs, excels files, and even photos into downloadable and shareable McKinsey-level reports and presentations ‚Äî so you can make better decisions grounded in data.

name: TravelAnimator
tagline: Turn Google Maps URLs into stunning map animations.
description: TravelAnimator turns Google Maps URLs into travel map videos in seconds. It stands out with 250+ 3D vehicle models, 30+ map styles, 4K and HD exports, the ability to add photos to routes, and a completely ad-free experience. Built for travelers, creators, and storytellers who want their journeys to look as good as they felt, without spending hours editing.

name: Meet-Ting
tagline: AI that gives your schedule a brain.
description: Ting gives your schedule a brain, so it can make decisions for you. It‚Äôs an AI availability agent that manages your calendar over email and text. You set your goals and preferences, and Ting learns your patterns every time you CC or message it, building AI intuition over time. Delegate Ting to plan meetings with up to five guests, handling booking, rescheduling, pre-call briefs, and no-shows. Each week, Ting proactively checks in to help align your calendar with what you want to achieve.

name: Meteroid
tagline: Billing platform to launch, test, + scale business models
description: Meteroid is a monetization platform built so early-stage teams can ship like they're already at scale: ‚úÖ One engine for subscriptions, usage-based pricing, quote-to-cash, invoicing and business intelligence ‚úÖ Support any Go-to-Market motion ‚úÖ Open-source (not open core) and extendable. Self-host it or let us run it. Either way, it‚Äôs yours. üöÄ

name: AI Chrome Extension Builder
tagline: Build Chrome Extensions by Talking to AI
description: Prompt AI to build complete Chrome Extensions. Give instructions in plain English and AI designs, codes, writes your privacy policy and creates a Chrome Web Store listing for you. Anyone can become an extension developer without knowing how to code.

name: The Prompting Company
tagline: SEO is dead. Be the product cited by ChatGPT.
description: Customers now get recommendations from AI, not Google. Be in those answers.

name: Agentic Vision in Gemini
tagline: Agentic visual reasoning with code execution
description: Agentic Vision, a new capability introduced in Gemini 3 Flash, converts image understanding from a static act into an agentic process

name: StoryCV
tagline: Guided AI that interviews you and writes your resume for you
description: Resume builders make you write first. StoryCV doesn‚Äôt. We start with a guided interview. You talk through your work without worrying about wording or length. We extract the context and write clear, professional resume bullet points for you.

name: Kipps AI WhatsApp Agent
tagline: Turn WhatsApp chats into revenue on autopilot
description: The easiest and cheapest way to grow your business on WhatsApp. See every message in one simple inbox where AI answers fast, but you can still step in for the important stuff. Automatically send birthday, rewards and loyalty gifts to your customers. Stop wasting money and start selling more for just $11

name: Willow on Windows
tagline: Write anywhere on your computer. By voice.
description: You write hundreds of messages, emails, and prompts a day. Willow is an AI voice typing tool that lets you speak them instead. Willow now works on Windows, Mac, and iOS. You can use it anywhere on your computer, like Gmail, Slack, Notion, Cursor, and more. Willow is powerful because it's the fastest, most accurate, and the only dictation tool that actually personalizes to the way that you write over time.

name: BIOS
tagline: AI Scientist for biomedical research - #1 on BixBench
description: BIOS is an AI Scientist that ranked #1 on BixBench for biological data analysis. BIOS offers human-in-the-loop checkpoints to steer investigations mid-flight, or fully autonomous mode for uninterrupted deep research‚Äîyou choose how much control to keep. Four specialized agents handle orchestration, literature review, data analysis, and novelty detection. Free tier available. Academic users withedu get full access free.

name: HighlightGPT
tagline: Highlight in ChatGPT, ask GPT in a side panel
description: HighlightGPT is a Chrome extension that lets you highlight text inside ChatGPT and open a side panel to ask AI, explain, ask, translate, or save memorizes. It‚Äôs a small workflow upgrade that makes ChatGPT feel more like a reading & thinking workspace.

name: Invofox 2.0
tagline: Document AI for real-world workflows, not just demos
description: Invofox 2.0 is a platform-level update focused on production-grade document parsing. While most document AI tools look accurate in demos, they struggle with messy, real-world inputs. This launch highlights a structured experimentation workflow that makes field- and document-level accuracy visible before production, helping teams understand accuracy changes, validate improvements, and confidently deploy reliable document workflows.

name: Fluent
tagline: Agentic AI in Any Mac App. Now with Native RAG
description: This time, Fluent is supercharged by MCP and a native RAG engine, and it's a real game-changer. Beyond its general purpose, RAG lets you replicate your writing style almost 100%. This launch is mostly about that: write like yourself, write like Jack London, write like the world's top marketers. And never be accused of AI slop. To put it simple ‚Äì Fluent RAG is the cornerstone of generating instead of writing.

name: LiquidFetch
tagline: Beautiful visual system fetch for macOS
description: LiquidFetch gives you a clean, visual overview of your Mac. Unlike tools like neofetch or fastfetch, LiquidFetch presents your setup info in a graphical interface. It's a 100% native macOS app.

name: Silkwave
tagline: Chat, record & transcribe on-device in a single workspace
description: Silkwave is a unified AI workspace for Mac. It brings major models into one chat interface using a Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) approach‚Äîconnect OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Nebius, or local Ollama. It features a powerful microphone and system audio recorder with near real-time transcription using on-device Apple Intelligence or OpenAI. It connects all your AI tools in one private app.

name: Fundable
tagline: Integrate startup, investor and people data in your product
description: Fundable is a startup, investor, and people dataset (like a Crunchbase) with a few improvements: Surfaces new deals before other platforms, provides sources for every datapoint, allows for natural language deal alerts ("coding agent startups in SF looking to hire"), much better UI, cheaper. First month is free. Hit us up if you want access to our API, Datafeed, or MCP!

name: doXmind
tagline: An AI editor that reasons with you
description: doXmind is "Cursor for Writing" ‚Äî bringing AI-powered coding assistant UX to document creation. Free beta ‚Äî no credit card required.

name: Fytly
tagline: You Said You‚Äôd Work Out. So What Happened?
description: You want a fit and healthy life, but most fitness apps are boring? We turned training and healthy habits into a video game, so it never feels boring again. FytlY‚Äôs AI builds your plan, then updates your workouts and habits based on what you actually do. No more ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt feel like it today‚Äù because streaks, ranks, and quests make you want to work out every day. Join the beta test and tell us what sucks.

name: Product Design Trends 2026
tagline: Design trends from teams fixing broken brands
description: This report is created by Qream designers who spent 2025 designing, breaking, fixing, and relaunching products across tech, SaaS, Web3, social impact, and enterprise. This report has a mission: to remind that design is human, imperfect, and powerful, especially when everything around tries to make it generic. Let your eye travel. There‚Äôs no second take on 2026!
